name: Manyullym Anvil (Pre-Alpha)
description:
Come play as Apollinare Tzimiskes, owner and proprietor of the Manyullym Anvil, the newest blacksmith shop in the city of Fairhallow. Design and craft weapons for the shop, sell to customers, and try to keep ahead of the competition.

The Pre-Alpha release of the Manyullym Anvil game.

Current features:

  • Blueprint drafting screen, which different parts can be selected and configured
    • Right-clicking allows you to rotate a part
  • Blueprint library screen, where saved blueprints can be reviewed and crafted
  • Shop inventory screen, where crafted items can be viewed and their prices set
  • Shop stockpile screen, where different materials can be viewed

Please direct any bugs encountered to this Google form.
